column4: Hey my friend is running Jaunty 9.04 and gets "Video mode not supported" on any monitors he tries when using the "nvidia" (The official ones..) drivers
Works fine when he uses the "nv" drivers, but obviously he'd like some hardware accel.
mabye his monitor doesnt support DPMS?
ahh. Mabye copy the modeline from the working config to the "nvidia" Xorg.conf?
